Name: TruBarrier Hazard Suit Hi-Vis Biohazard
Description:
Carrying Capacity: 1K µSCU
Temp. Rating: -5 / 32 °C

Guard yourself from toxic environmental hazards with the TruBarrier Hazard Suit, constructed from industrial-grade fabric and coated with a multi-layered, laminated polymer that offers a broad range of chemical protection without sacrificing mobility. The encapsulated design provides full-body protection from direct contact with dangerous materials when worn with its accompanying mask.
